text:
Mrs. Judith Stevens
-2-
September 26, 1956
Entries for the 1957 Prix Italia should be made prior to May 1st of
1957. It's to be hoped that all NAEB Stations mil make the necessary plans to
produce a program for the consideration of the American Jury in the fields of
drama and documentaries.
I hope the above is enou^i information to permit you to do a story
for the October Newsletter.
SNS/cb
Enc.
